data.title: Archives: Search for "Thandie Newton"
data.text:

Besieged

"...by: Bernardo Bertolucci. Starring: Claudio Santamaria, David Thewlis and Thandie Newton. It's been many a luna since Bernardo Bertolucci..."

Tyler Perry's Good Deeds

Tyler Perry also stars in his latest film, playing a wealthy businessman whose orderly life comes undone as the result of a good deed.

"...Directed by: Tyler Perry. Starring: Tyler Perry, Thandie Newton, Gabrielle Union, Brian White, Eddie Cibrian, Phylicia Rashad,..."

Texas Film Awards Announce More Stars

TimothÃ©e Chalamet, Thandie Newton to present awards

"...Call Me by Your Name co-star TimothÃ©e Chalamet, while Thandie Newton will present Paul Thomas Anderson with the inaugural..."

Something Wild

There's no pussyfooting about it: The Truth About Charlie is a remake -- of the widely adored Charade -- and Jonathan Demme isn't apologizing for it.

"...begins to describe what a great actress he believes Thandie Newton to be, even though she's so often cast..."

The Truth About Charlie

"...Ted Levine, Joong-Hoon Park, Tim Robbins, Mark Wahlberg and Thandie Newton. The Truth About Charlie, Jonathan Demme's remake of..."

Mr. Demme's Holiday

Oscar-winning director Jonathan Demme takes a trip to the city of lights and of love, of Tati and Truffaut, in his latest, The Truth About Charlie.

"...described your desire to create a contemporary vehicle for Thandie Newton. Looking at your career as a whole, you've..."

Page Two

Leaving us no time to catch our breaths after the Austin City Limits, Pecan Street, and Cinematexas festivals, our little city is graced next with the Heart of Film Screenwriters Conference and Austin Film Festival, unofficially kicked off by a screening (co-sponsored by the Austin Film Society) of Jonathan Demme's new film, The Truth About Charlie.

"...stars Mark Wahlberg, Tim Robbins, and the truly marvelous Thandie Newton...."

Gringo

Long-delayed stoner comedy is a little stale.

"...Starring: David Oyelowo, Joel Edgerton, Charlize Theron, Sharlto Copley, Thandie Newton, Amanda Seyfried, Harry Treadaway, Yul Vazquez, Carlos Corona..."

Run Fatboy Run

Funnyman Simon Pegg stars in this soft and plodgy rom-com: Sadly, this by-the-numbers redemption tale careens uncomfortably from sentimentality to stomach-turning sight gags.

"...Directed by: David Schwimmer. Starring: Simon Pegg, Thandie Newton, Hank Azaria, Dylan Moran, Harish Patel, India de..."

Norbit

The three personas Eddie Murphy adopts in this film literally fill the screen, but the script doesn't serve his multidimensional talents.

"...Directed by: Brian Robbins. Starring: Eddie Murphy, Thandie Newton, Cuba Gooding Jr., Eddie Griffin, Terry Crews, Clifton..."

The Pursuit of Happyness

Will Smith plays a self-made success who trains as a stockbroker even though he is homeless and raising a young son on the streets of San Francisco in this movie based on the true-life story of Chris Gardner.

"...Gabriele Muccino. Starring: Will Smith, Jaden Christopher Syre Smith, Thandie Newton, Dan Castellaneta, Brian Howe, James Karen and Kurt..."

Flirting

"...Directed by: John Duigan. Starring: Noah Taylor, Thandie Newton and Nicole Kidman. This film is the second..."

Fast, Twisted, and Deeply Paranoid

A year of notes on The Manchurian Candidate remake's script

"...the anti-Cary Grant. At the very end, we know Thandie Newton's failings in her taste in men. Witness Charlie...."

The Austin Chronicle Guide to the Mission: Impossible Movies

Your mission, if you choose to accept it ...

"...Directed by John Woo. Starring Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandie Newton, John Polson, Anthony Hopkins, Ving Rhames...."

Reminiscence

The past is the only place to go in this future Miami

"...Directed by: Lisa Joy. Starring: Hugh Jackman, Rebecca Ferguson, Thandie Newton, Cliff Curtis and Marina de Tavira...."

Solo: A Star Wars Story

Should you have a bad feeling about this stand-alone Star Wars?

"...Ehrenreich, Joonas Suotamo, Woody Harrelson, Emilia Clarke, Donald Glover, Thandie Newton, Phoebe Waller-Bridge, Paul Bettany, Jon Favreau and Linda..."

RocknRolla

Director Guy Ritchie once more delivers a kinetic and consequence-free tribute to the criminal lifestyle.

"...Directed by: Guy Ritchie. Starring: Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson, Thandie Newton, Mark Strong, Idris Elba, Tom Hardy, Toby Kebbell,..."

W.

Oliver Stoneâs Bush portrait is a tale of two movies: one a humanizing portrait of a failure as a young man, the other a damning but unsurprising look inside an administration gone loopy on ideological zealotry.

"...Banks, James Cromwell, Ellen Burstyn, Jeffrey Wright, Toby Jones, Thandie Newton, Scott Glenn and Richard Dreyfuss. Stoneâs latest head-first..."
